member.name: M:DevTalks1.Controllers.StartupController.FetchMOTD(ViewModels.Features.Startup.MOTD.Request)
member.summary: Fetches either a joke or a quote, depending on the requested message type
member.param: Identifies the requested message type, either joke or quote
member.returns: A message of the requested type

member.name: M:DevTalks1.Controllers.StartupController.MOTD(ViewModels.Features.Startup.MOTD.Request.MessageType)
member.summary: Retrieves a message of the day of the specified type
member.param: Either a joke, or a quote
member.returns: The text of the joke or quote
